content: odilitime: Contributed significantly to documentation improvements with several merged PRs including Quickstart Guide enhancements (#325, #334) and README clarifications (#333), while also addressing multiple bugs in the codebase with fixes for Discord messaging (#598), tweet handling (#620), and environment configuration (#427, #432). Fixed several critical issues including agent DirectClient typing (#605, +21k/-2.7k lines) and time prompt formatting (#603), demonstrating versatility across both documentation and code maintenance. Created three feature/bug issues (#467, #439, #617) that were subsequently closed and actively participated in the review process with 8 reviews and 15 comments across PRs and issues.
